text:
League 1
OM-OL: Memphis Depay uncertain?
Dutch striker Memphis Depay was injured last night at Groupama Stadium against Benfica. This fact of play could revise the plans of Rudi Garcia.
06 Nov 2019, 10:40 by Mourad Bennis



Alfred GomisDijonIcon Sport



Youcef AtalOGC NiceIcon Sport



William SalibaASSEIcon Sport



Edson MexerBordeauxIcon Sport



Jordan AmaviOMIcon Sport



Didier NdongDijonIcon Sport



Baptiste SantamariaAngersIcon Sport



Gael KakutaAmiensIcon Sport



Ui-jo HwangBordeauxIcon Sport



Memphis DepayOLIcon Sport



Denis BouangaASSEIcon Sport



St√©phane JobardDijonIcon Sport

Bouanga, Depay, Amavi ... the typical team of the weekend in Ligue 1




Brilliant and effective since several games, Memphis Depay could not take part in the shock against the OM. It would be a huge blow for the men of Rudi Garcia.




Memphis's injury falls at the wrong time




Memphis Depay + 12 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

Lyon spent a good night against Benfica in the fourth round of the Champions League. Winners 3-1 of Lisbo√®tes, OL now occupies the 2nd place in his group, just behind the RB Leipzig (the German club has 9 points, two units more than the OL). But, the premature exit of Memphis Depay has tarnished the performance of the Gones. This is not good news for Rudi Garcia's troops, especially at four days of facing OM at the Velodrome.
According to the Phoenician, the Dutch international suffers from a muscular discomfort in a thigh and is, in fact, uncertain for the shock of this Sunday. Author of 11 goals in all competitions, Memphis Depay could miss the offensive device of the OL.
